data.title: Bob Brown
data.text: Behind every successful man there's a lot u unsuccessful years. http://goo.gl/

data.title: Jean Kerr
data.text: I think success has no rules, but you can learn a lot from failure.

data.title: Colin L. Powell
data.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure. www.youtube.com

data.title: Balzac
data.text: There is no such thing as a great talent without great will - power.

data.title: Charles Chaplin
data.text: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.

data.title: R.M. Nixon
data.text: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.

data.title: Erasmus
data.text: None is of freedom or of life deserving unless he daily conquers it anew.

data.title: John Ruskin
data.text: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.

data.title: George Eliot
data.text: What makes life dreary is the want of motive.

data.title: Lincoln
data.text: Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.

data.title: Erasmus
data.text: None is of freedom or of life deserving unless he daily conquers it anew.

data.title: Thomas Addison
data.text: A strong man will struggle with the storms of fate.
